hero.title: News & Media
hero.subtitle: Latest updates and achievements from the MVOS Lab

newsItems.description: Our team has published four significant research papers in 2025, advancing the field of precision agriculture through innovative AI and robotics applications:

publications.title: AI-driven Web Application for Early Detection of Sudden Death Syndrome (SDS) in Soybean Leaves Using Hyperspectral Images and Genetic Algorithm
publications.authors: Pappu Kumar Yadav, Rishik Aggarwal, Supriya Paudel, Amee Parmar, et al.

publications.title: Robotic System with AI for Real Time Weed Detection, Canopy Aware Spraying, and Droplet Pattern Evaluation
publications.authors: Inayat Rasool, Pappu Kumar Yadav, Amee Parmar, Hasan Mirzakhaninafchi, et al.

publications.title: Development and Evaluation of a Multiaxial Modular Ground Robot for Estimating Soybean Phenotypic Traits Using an RGB-Depth Sensor
publications.authors: James Kemeshi, Young Chang, Pappu Kumar Yadav, Maitiniyazi Maimaitijang, Graig Reicks

publications.title: Supervised Hyperspectral Band Selection Using Texture Features for Classification of Citrus Leaf Diseases with YOLOv8
publications.authors: Quentin Frederick, Thomas Burks, Jonathan Adam Watson, Pappu Kumar Yadav, Jianwei Qin, Moon Kim, Megan M. Dewdney

newsItems.description: Lab members presented six research papers at SPIE Defense + Commercial Sensing 2025 in Orlando, Florida, showcasing innovations in agricultural robotics, machine vision systems, and precision agriculture:

publications.title: AI driven computer vision for detection and pose estimation of chile peppers (Capsicum annuum L.) for a robotic harvester
publications.authors: Amee Parmar, Inayat Rasool, Pappu Yadav

publications.title: PhenAI-bot: high-throughput 3D crop phenotyping of soybean (Glycine max) in greenhouse settings
publications.authors: Ivan Perez Olivera, Swarnabha Roy, Pappu K. Yadav, Amee Parmar, Rishik Aggarwal, Inayat Rasool

publications.title: PyBullet for kinematic and dynamic simulations of an agricultural robot for corn stem disease detection
publications.authors: Inayat Rasool, Iv√°n P Olivera, Amee Parmar, Young Chang, Tom Burks, Pappu Yadav

publications.title: PhenAI-Bot: precision 3D crop phenotyping of pepper (Capsicum annuum L.) varieties in a greenhouse
publications.authors: Swarnabha Roy, Amee Parmar, Rishik Aggarwal, Stavros Kalafatis, Pappu Kumar Yadav

publications.title: Harvest-Bot: precision harvesting of pepper (Capsicum annuum L.) varieties in a greenhouse
publications.authors: Swarnabha Roy, Amee Parmar, Rishik Aggarwal, Stavros Kalafatis, Pappu Kumar Yadav

publications.title: Hyperspectral imaging and machine learning for soybean SDS severity classification

newsItems.description: Our team published six significant research papers in 2024, contributing to advances in precision agriculture, machine vision, and agricultural robotics:

publications.title: Detection of citrus black spot fungi Phyllosticta citricarpa & Phyllosticta capitalensis on UV-C fluorescence images using YOLOv8
publications.authors: Pappu Kumar Yadav, Thomas Burks, Jianwei Qin, Moon Kim, Megan M. Dewdney, Fartash Vasefi

publications.title: Classification of Citrus Leaf Diseases Using Hyperspectral Reflectance and Fluorescence Imaging and Machine Learning Techniques
publications.authors: Hyun Jung Min, Jianwei Qin, Pappu Kumar Yadav, Quentin Frederick, Thomas Burks, Megan Dewdney, Insuck Baek, Moon Kim

publications.title: Classifying adaxial and abaxial sides of diseased citrus leaves with selected hyperspectral bands and YOLOv8
publications.authors: Quentin Frederick, Thomas Burks, Pappu Kumar Yadav, Jianwei Qin, Moon Kim, Megan Dewdney

publications.title: AI-Driven Computer Vision Detection of Cotton in Corn Fields Using UAS Remote Sensing Data and Spot-Spray Application
publications.authors: Pappu Kumar Yadav, J. Alex Thomasson, Robert Hardin, Stephen W. Searcy, Ulisses Braga-Neto, Sorin C. Popescu, Roberto Rodriguez III, Daniel E. Martin, Juan Enciso

publications.title: Automated classification of citrus disease on fruits and leaves using convolutional neural network generated features from hyperspectral images and machine learning classifiers
publications.authors: Pappu Kumar Yadav, Thomas Burks, Jianwei Qin, Moon Kim, Quentin Frederick, Megan M. Dewdney, Mark A. Ritenour

publications.title: A case study of spatial variability in irrigation depth and surface characteristics of a stadium football pitch
publications.authors: Karem Meza, Chase Straw, David Asenccios, Pappu Kumar Yadav

newsItems.description: The MVOS lab member, Amee Parmar gets selected as one of the recipients of the prestigious Future Innovators of America Fellowship! Congratulations to her!

mediaCoverage.title: Media Coverage
mediaCoverage.description: The MVOS Lab's research has been featured in various agricultural technology publications and university news outlets, highlighting our contributions to sustainable farming practices and innovative agricultural solutions.
